module.name: example

attributes.attr: {"command": "# we can setup json data here directly\nmodule.attr.lineAttr.set({\"value\":5, \"list\":[1,2,3]})", "label": "Press me", "default": "label"}

module.name: child
module.run: print("I'm a child") parent = module.parent() lineAttr = parent.attr.lineAttr print("lineAttr from child", lineAttr.get())
